sql.if: AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') or a.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')

mapper.insert: insert into t_faq (faq_div, title, content, view_cnt, file_uuid, ins_seq, ins_dt, upt_seq, upt_dt, del_yn) values (#{faqDiv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uptSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uptDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_faq set faq_div = #{faqDiv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, view_cnt = #{viewCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, file_uuid = #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upt_seq = #{uptSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, upt_dt = now(), del_yn = #{delYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where faq_seq = #{faqSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select faq_seq, faq_div, title, content, view_cnt, file_uuid, ins_seq, ins_dt, upt_seq, upt_dt, del_yn from t_faq where faq_seq = #{faqSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select faq_seq, faq_div, title, content, view_cnt, file_uuid, ins_seq, ins_dt, upt_seq, upt_dt, del_yn from t_faq

/* FAQ 조회하기 selectFaqAllList */ SELECT a.faq_seq ,a.faq_div ,a.title ,a.content ,a.view_cnt ,a.file_uuid ,a.del_yn ,a.ins_seq ,a.ins_dt ,a.upt_seq ,a.upt_dt FROM t_faq a WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY a.faq_seq DESC

SELECT a.faq_seq ,a.faq_div ,a.title ,a.content ,a.view_cnt ,a.file_uuid ,(SELECT file_nm FROM t_file_sub WHERE file_uuid_sub = a.file_uuid) as fileNm ,(SELECT file_save_nm FROM t_file_sub WHERE file_uuid_sub = a.file_uuid) as fileSaveNm ,a.del_yn ,a.ins_seq ,ins_dt ,a.upt_seq ,upt_dt FROM t_faq a WHERE 1=1 AND faq_seq = ${faqSeq}
